scripts.build: npm run --silent prepare && cp -R ./src/public/* ./dist/public && cp -R ./src/views/* ./dist/views && html-minifier --input-dir ./src/public --output-dir ./dist/public --collapse-whitespace --file-ext html && uglifycss ./src/public/style.css --output ./dist/public/style.css && uglifyjs ./src/views/script.ejs --compress --mangle toplevel --warn --output ./dist/views/script.ejs && uglifyjs ./src/modules/thumbnail-factory.js --compress --mangle --warn --output ./dist/modules/thumbnail-factory.js && uglifyjs ./src/index.js --compress --mangle --warn --output ./dist/index.js
scripts.dockerbuild: rm -rf ./home-tab-bookmark.tar && npm run --silent build && docker build -t dannystudio/home-tab-bookmark .
scripts.dockersave: npm run dockerbuild && echo build completed, now save to tar... &&docker save -o ./home-tab-bookmark.tar dannystudio/home-tab-bookmark
